Description: Wall sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) Late Wild Goat pottery bowl; interior streaky brown with two red bands lined in white; exterior, cream slip: foreleg of goat to right; below, meander running left between bands with added colour; on lower wall, rays; filling ornaments: strokes, dots, roundels.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.219)
